check_border.description: Whether to create full-page WIDTH/HEIGHT etc. if no border/pagespace present

check_words.description: Check whether PAGE-XML contains any Words and fail if not

skip_empty_lines.description: Whether to omit or keep empty lines in PAGE-XML

trailing_dash_to_hyp.description: Whether to add a <HYP/> element if the last word in a line ends in '-'

dummy_word.description: Whether to create a Word for TextLine that have TextEquiv/Unicode but no Word

dummy_textline.description: Whether to create a TextLine for regions that have TextEquiv/Unicode but no TextLine

textequiv_index.description: If multiple textequiv, use the n-th TextEquiv by @index

region_order.description: Order in which to iterate over the regions

textline_order.description: Order in which to iterate over the textlines

textequiv_fallback_strategy.description: What to do if selected TextEquiv @index is not available: 'raise' will lead to a runtime error, 'first' will use the first TextEquiv, 'last' will use the last TextEquiv on the element

alto_version.description: Whether to create full-page WIDTH/HEIGHT etc. if no border/pagespace present

timestamp_src.description: Which element to use for the timestamp
